head.title: Remove Metadata to {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: {{ProgLang}} metadata processing API to remove metadata information to {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Remove Metadata From {{FileFormatUp}} File In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Remove metadata information from a variety of documents, images, audio & video file formats using {{ProdFullName}} API
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}} API

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an advanced set of metadata manipulation features, allowing developers to easily read, edit, remove, search, compare, replace and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Use metadata management API to delete metadata details from PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats along with many other metadata processing features.

formats.title: Deleting Metadata Properties From Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi format documents and images metadata deletion API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to remove metadata details to {{FileFormatUp}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content.step_1: Load {{FileFormatUp}} with an instance of {{TextMetadata}} class.
content.step_2: Clean all metadata in the file.
content.step_4: Save the changes back in {{FileFormatUp}} format.

more_features.title: Manage Document Metadata Easily
more_features.description: Keep your files organized and searchable with our easy-to-use document metadata management. Access, edit, and update various details to find what you need quickly.

feature_1.title: See Document Metadata Quickly
feature_1.content: Get all the important information about a document instantly, like author, creation date, and more.

feature_2.title: Edit Document Metadata Easily
feature_2.content: Update metadata directly in your documents for better organization, searchability, and accuracy.

feature_3.title: Powerful Document Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Do more with your document metadata! Add custom information, remove unnecessary data, and ensure everything stays consistent.

code_1.title: Clear DOCX person metadata

code_1.comment_1: Load a document for further processing
code_1.comment_2: Specify metadata type to be removed
